about_the_game:
The Legacy is a cooperative survival game in the horror genre.

In 1990 a curse fell on our hometown, our grandfather, a local molfar and magician, according to a sinister tradition - once in 66 years should sacrifice one of his descendants to the dark forest forces, but he couldn't do it, so he sent me, my two brothers and sister to Kiev to protect us from the curse. He saved our lives, but doomed the city and its surroundings to death and destruction.....

Years passed, we have already become adults and built our own lives, but the memory of Svetlograd tormented our hearts. At one of the family dinners - we made a decision to return there and end the darkness forever, to free the city and give people the opportunity to live normally. Each of us has our own unique skills, strengths and weaknesses, so we complement each other perfectly. Having gathered some equipment - we went there, to the meeting...

Survival

In The Legacy - a detailed survival system, your character will need food, water, the cold climate of the autumn Carpathian Mountains - will force you to build a fire to keep warm, move more, or find shelter in the cold night. Also, your stamina depends on which character you have chosen and how full your backpack is. A bottle of energy drink can help you avoid stamina problems for a while.

When you run out of food and there is no gas station or other place where you can find food nearby, catch and cook a carp, or hunt down and kill a wild animal to cook juicy meat over a fire, in an oven or in a cauldron. Also, don't forget about mushrooms and apples.

Potions, Magic and Mysticism

Svetlograd is not just a city, and the settlements around it are not just small villages. Many local legends tell about mysticism, dark and light magic and mythical entities, so the inhabitants here are not simple. That's why in The Legacy you will find recipes for magic potions, information about dark entities and how to fight them, about rituals. Collect herbs, mushrooms and other ingredients. You will have the opportunity to learn the local mythology and fight evil with guns and bullets, or with rituals and potions.

Large open world, different locations

The game features a large open world, where you can explore different locations, while completing tasks and surviving. While exploring the game world - you will find notes of local residents, which will tell you various mystical stories about Svetlograd and its surroundings.

Also, when you start a new game - all game items (food, weapons, ammo, book pages, enemies, plants, mushrooms, animals, etc.) - appear in random places, it gives you the opportunity - to play each time a truly new and unique game, with an unpredictable ending.

Construction, resource extraction and item creation

Having tools, such as an axe or a knife - you can extract various resources, but if you do not have tools - try to break sticks with your bare hands, but be careful - you can easily cut yourself, then you will need bandages. Obtained resources - you can use them to create various items, as well as building your own house or base, camp. In a team building a camp or a house is faster, when one player extracts resources, the second builds, and the third builds a fire and prepares food, so that after building a camp - you can start cooking a delicious dinner and replenish your strength before new adventures.

Key features

  • the opportunity to play in teams of up to 4 people or alone;

  • the opportunity to meet and fight with different mythical creatures;

  • a large and dangerous open world;

  • hunting for animals, fishing;

  • each mythical creature has its own unique attacks and behavior features;

  • pumping unique badges;

  • the ability to play on 100+ servers simultaneously, thanks to the advanced save system, play with friends or strangers;

  • voice and text chat;

  • the ability to choose a unique avatar from a large list of available avatars;

  • construction system, build your base or camp from improvised means;

  • the atmosphere of mysticism of Western Ukraine and the abandoned city of Svetlograd and the surrounding area;

  • detailed survival mechanics - the ability to get wet, if you stay in the rain for a long time, the character freezes faster, until you warm up by the fire or dry out. Hunger, thirst, temperature, stamina, blood and cuts, infections, curses cast, the ability to brew and drink potions to get rid of curses or heal wounds, and more;

  • numerous crafting recipes;

  • ability to collect recipes, ingredients and brew potions, perform rituals to banish dark forces;

  • go boating, fishing, hunting, cooking on the fire or in the oven, helping each other, sharing resources, exploring the huge game world;

  • every new game - loot (game items) - appear in random places, with a certain probability, enemies behave differently, mythical creatures appear differently, in one game they can be 3, in another 5;

  • at the beginning of the game - you have ordinary equipment, weak weapons, but if you carefully explore the world - you can find a variety of weapons, meet the military, with a fairly advanced artificial intelligence and fight with them, or find a secret bunker with very rare weapons, but be careful, in the bunker....;

name: The Legacy

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 760 or AMD R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection, SSD is highly recommended or expect longer than average load times.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790K / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
  • Graphics: RTX 3060 / RX 570 Series or better
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX®-compatible
  • Additional Notes: Internet connection, SSD is highly recommended or expect longer than average load times.

short_description: Cooperative survival and horror genre. You and your family have returned to your native land, on which a terrible curse and darkness has fallen. Will you be able to survive in a harsh and dangerous environment and stop the evil? It depends only on you, on your skills and ability to help each other.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian
